text: <@UQERM7BLY>, <@UEC65BQV8> hello, actually my client told me to build a module that will make blogs with custom desingn. I am new comer in HubSpot , thats why i am confused where to start and is there any tutorial to do so..  <@UEC65BQV8> could you please tell me that what will be the best to do that, will i make global module with grouping field like title ,text ,img etc???

<@U01RCFFAS73> The blog tool in HubSpot is its own beast. You could think of each blog post as having “fields” analogous to module fields (things like author, tags, title, etc.). The template files (post and listing templates) then call those fields to populate the template
see here on the sample template from HubSpot
Hello all, I'm working on a blog listing design and was wondering if anyone can guide me into adding a sidebar because I am new to HubSpot and trying to learn. Thanks
